rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area designed for receiving guests and transitioning into the main living areas.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area with eco-friendly features such as energy-efficient windows and natural ventilation. Incorporates Vastu principles by facing the north or east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family meals with natural lighting from a large window.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern eco-friendly kitchen featuring energy-saving appliances, proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines (south-east direction preferred).

rooms.name: Guest Toilet and Utility Room
rooms.description: Includes a guest toilet, laundry area with eco-friendly fixtures.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A self-contained living space for staff ensuring privacy and comfort, designed with sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Car Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage integrated into the design, featuring electric vehicle charging points and eco-friendly insulation.

openings.description: A welcoming entryway with natural stone detailing, aligned for optimal energy flow.
Provides additional outdoor space and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with walk-in closet, ensuite bathroom and private balcony ensuring privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with built-in storage, Vastu-compliant layout focusing on the north-west direction.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Functional bedroom with eco-friendly insulation and natural lighting, optimized for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with integrated storage solutions and designed per Vastu guidelines (south-east favorable).

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Extra bedroom, possibly a study or guest room, ensuring flexible use with eco-friendly features.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Ensuite master bathroom with water-saving fixtures, natural stone finishes and integrated storage.

openings.description: Provides an outdoor living space for the master bedroom suite.
Eco-friendly spiral staircase connecting first floor to ground floor, with minimal material usage.

additional_features.description: A private eco-friendly swimming pool designed with sustainable water recycling systems and integrated into the outdoor space.
